name: Ohio Rampage
description:
You play as an experimental test subject who has been injected with "big boy juice." Your goal is to cause as much chaos as possible before inevitably getting neutralized.

You can pick up nearly any object and throw it. Explosive barrels are littered across the map and will damage everything when they blow up. 

Hidden events can be found around the map that will increase your points tenfold.

This project doubles as my final project for GD50, and the Brackey's 2021.2 game jam entry.
